name: test_e2e_with_logs[606_API_MASS_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_MASS_004` |
| **Name** | Mass Assignment Multiple Admin Fields |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | mass_assignment |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"permissions":"admin","isAdmin":true}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22permissions%22%3A%22admin%22%2C%22isAdmin%22%3Atrue%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~35000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:55:24.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
